item.title: 交易商权衡中东风险和供应过剩，石油走高
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了中东潜在的供应风险和全球需求疲软的前景，石油价格上涨。【原文：Oil inched up as traders weighed potential supply risks from the Middle East against a weak outlook for global demand.】

item.title: 三星助推盘后韩元交易量翻番
item.description: 自 8 月份以来，韩元在延长时间内的交易量几乎翻了一番，这凸显了韩国在使全球投资者更容易进入其金融市场方面所取得的进展。【原文：The volume of trades in the South Korean won in extended hours almost doubled since August, underscoring the nation’s progress in making its financial market more accessible for global investors.】

item.title: Robinhood 计划为交易者提供期货和指数期权服务
item.description: Robinhood Markets 公司正在将其产品范围扩大到期货交易和指数期权，因为这家零售经纪公司希望吸引更多成熟的投资者加入其平台。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is broadening its offerings to futures trading and index options as the retail brokerage aims to attract more sophisticated investors to its platform.】

item.title: 亚洲股市在美国小盘股反弹中上扬：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街收盘走高后，亚洲股市早盘上涨，这主要得益于大盘股科技股的轮动上涨，以及包括小公司在内的经济敏感型股票的上涨。【原文：Equities in Asia braced for early gains after Wall Street closed higher, helped along by a rotation out of mega-cap tech and into economically sensitive shares including smaller companies.】

item.title: 氧化铝价格飙升提升利润，美国铝业股价大涨
item.description: 美国铝业公司（Alcoa Corp.）股价在尾盘跳涨多达 10%，原因是氧化铝价格强劲，使其季度盈利达到两年多来的最高点。【原文：Alcoa Corp. shares jumped as much as 10% in late trading as strong alumina prices boosted quarterly earnings to the highest in more than two years.】

item.title: 苹果公司与中国比亚迪秘密合作开发长续航电动汽车电池
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司与中国汽车制造商比亚迪股份有限公司合作多年，作为其现已取消的汽车项目的一部分，开发了长距离电池，为今天所使用的技术奠定了基础。【原文：Apple Inc. worked with Chinese automaker BYD Co. for years as part of its now-canceled car project, developing long-range batteries that helped lay the groundwork for technology used today, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Ventum Financial 因总裁离职而调整管理团队
item.description: Ventum Financial Corp.由两家较小的加拿大公司合并而成，成立不到四个月，Jean-Paul Bachellerie 就不再担任该公司总裁。【原文：Jean-Paul Bachellerie is out as president of boutique investment firm Ventum Financial Corp., less than four months after it was formed by the merger of two smaller Canadian companies.】

item.title: 摩根大通三位 CLO 银行家离职加盟 SMBC
item.description: 三井住友金融集团公司（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.）正在从摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. is hiring a trio of bankers from JPMorgan Chase & Co. to grow the Japanese firm’s collateralized loan obligation platform, as activity in the roughly $1 trillion market has surged this year.】

item.title: 供应过剩担忧加剧，必和必拓铁矿石产量略有上升
item.description: 必和必拓集团有限公司（BHP Group Ltd.）表示，其第一季度铁矿石产量比去年同期增长了 2%，这是因为主要矿商提高产量的举措引发了供过于求的担忧。【原文：BHP Group Ltd. said iron ore output in its first quarter rose 2% from the year-before, as moves by major miners to ramp up production raise the specter of over-supply.】

item.title: 耐克走向户外，寻找新的增长点
item.description: 耐克公司在经历了艰难的一年后，正在寻找新的增长点，准备在全球范围内推动其户外业务 All Conditions Gear，该公司生产防水靴、防撕裂夹克和日用背包等徒步旅行装备。【原文：Nike Inc., on the hunt for new growth avenues following a rocky year, is preparing a global push for its outdoor business, All Conditions Gear, which makes hiking gear such as waterproof boots, ripstop jackets and day packs.】

item.title: 迪尔宣布在爱荷华州和伊利诺伊州的农业不景气时期裁员更多
item.description: 迪尔公司（Deere & Co.）将在爱荷华州和伊利诺伊州再裁员近 300 人，因为农用设备的需求从近几年的生产高峰期开始放缓。【原文：Deere & Co. is laying off an additional nearly 300 people in Iowa and Illinois as demand for farm equipment slows from the peak production of recent years.】

item.title: 债券期货震荡有望重燃被烧毁的国债交易
item.description: 国债期货头寸的平仓将重新点燃债券市场的一个热门赌注，这个赌注已经随着交易员们削减对美联储积极降息的预期而被烧毁。【原文：The unwinding of positions in Treasury futures stands to rekindle a popular bond-market wager that’s been burned as traders pare back expectations for aggressive Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席人事官离职不到两年
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苹果公司的首席人事官将在不到两年后离开这家 iPhone 制造商，这标志着该公司高管的任期异常短暂。【原文：Apple Inc.’s chief people officer is leaving the iPhone maker after less than two years, according to people with knowledge of the matter, marking an unusually short tenure for a senior executive at the company.】

item.title: 外国人加强对波动剧烈的韩国股票的期权交易
item.description: 多年来，韩国交易所一直试图吸引投资者参与其单一股票期权，但收效甚微。这种情况正在开始改变。【原文：For years, the South Korean exchange sought to lure investors to its single-stock options with little success. That’s starting to change.】

item.title: 棉花收购战的胜利助推德雷福斯交易商在亚洲的发展
item.description: 路易达孚公司（Louis Dreyfus Co.）历时8个月对澳大利亚最大棉花加工企业的收购终于结束，在一场激烈的控制权争夺战中取得了胜利。【原文：Louis Dreyfus Co. is finally at the end of its eight-month pursuit of Australia’s biggest cotton processor, securing victory in a bitter fight for control of the company that pitted the major trader against fellow behemoth Olam Agri Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 纽约市洛克菲勒中心寻求 34 亿美元的商业抵押债券交易
item.description: 洛克菲勒中心是纽约市标志性圣诞树和无线电城音乐厅的所在地，该中心的业主正在利用过去十年中最大的商业抵押债券之一对办公和零售空间进行再融资。【原文：The owners of Rockefeller Center, the site of New York City’s iconic Christmas tree and Radio City Music Hall, are refinancing the office and retail space with one of the largest commercial mortgage bonds in the last decade.】

item.title: J&J 滑石粉和解持异议者指责公司收买投票权
item.description: 据持异议索赔人的律师称，对强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）提出的与婴幼儿奶粉有关的健康索赔进行投票和解的人，其选票应被取消，因为这家消费品巨头操纵了计票结果。【原文：People who voted to settle their baby power-related health claims against Johnson & Johnson should have their ballots thrown out because the consumer products giant rigged the tally, according to lawyers for holdout claimants.】

item.title: 跳跃交易公司在游戏开发商诉讼中被控 "抽水倾销
item.description: 视频游戏开发商 FractureLabs 对 Jump Trading 提起诉讼，指控这家加密货币行业最大的做市商之一 "欺诈和欺骗"，操纵了一款网络游戏中使用的代币的价格。【原文：Video-game developer FractureLabs filed a lawsuit against Jump Trading, accusing one of the cryptocurrency industry’s biggest market makers of “fraud and deceit” by manipulating the price of a token used in an online game.】

item.title: 拉加德呼吁欧洲利用挑战推动变革
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德表示，欧洲应将日益分化的世界秩序和地缘政治冲突带来的挑战作为加强国内市场基础的契机。【原文：Europe should use the challenges posed by an increasingly fragmented world order and geopolitical conflicts as an opportunity to strengthen the foundations of its domestic market, according to European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 高盛集团正洽谈加入 Northvolt 救援行动
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Northvolt AB 的第二大股东高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s investment arm, the second-largest shareholder in Northvolt AB, is considering joining other investors in an effort to rescue the cash-strapped battery maker, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 主要立法者推动切断华为供应商与美国芯片设备的联系
item.description: 美国主要议员正在向拜登政府施压，要求阻止华为技术有限公司的供应商购买美国芯片制造设备，从而使阻止这家受制裁的中国电信巨头在半导体制造领域取得进展的努力升级。【原文：Key US lawmakers are pressing the Biden administration to block Huawei Technologies Co. suppliers from buying American chipmaking gear, escalating efforts to prevent the sanctioned Chinese telecom giant from making progress on semiconductor manufacturing.】

item.title: ASML 芯片大跌后纳斯达克 100 指数期货持有量减少 60 亿美元
item.description: 本周二，由于芯片制造商 ASML Holding NV 意外宣布下调 2025 年业绩指引后股价下滑，交易员以今年以来最快的速度退出纳斯达克 100 指数期货。【原文：Traders exited Nasdaq-100 futures at the fastest pace this year on Tuesday as shares of chip makers slid following ASML Holding NV’s surprise announcement lowering its 2025 guidance.】

item.title: 自然历史博物馆寻求债券买家帮助资金回流
item.description: Covid-19 大流行给拥有 3,000 万件珍贵文物的纽约市美国自然历史博物馆带来了数十年来的首次赤字。该博物馆计划利用市政债券市场获得 8500 万美元的资金支持。【原文：The Covid-19 pandemic brought New York City’s American Museum of Natural History, home to 30 million prized artifacts, its first deficits in decades. The institution plans to tap the municipal bond market for an $85 million boost.】

item.title: 德鲁肯米勒称市场 "非常确信 "特朗普将获胜
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者斯坦-德鲁肯米勒（Stan Druckenmiller）表示，在下个月的美国总统大选之前，市场已将唐纳德-特朗普的胜利计入价格。【原文：Billionaire investor Stan Druckenmiller said markets are pricing in a Donald Trump victory ahead of next month’s US presidential election.】

item.title: 自上次美国大选高峰以来小额债券销售激增幅度最大
item.description: 距离美国大选还有不到三周的时间，地方和州政府的债务销售正在激增。【原文：With the US elections less than three weeks away, the sale of local and state government debt is surging.】

item.title: 苏丹国民因涉嫌扮演 "匿名苏丹 "角色而被起诉
item.description: 两名苏丹国民因涉嫌参与一个名为 "匿名苏丹 "的组织，对政府和公司进行网络攻击而被美国检察官起诉。【原文：Two Sudanese nationals were indicted by US prosecutors for their alleged participation in a group known as “Anonymous Sudan” that conducted cyberattacks against governments and companies.】

item.title: 墨西哥的约里奥将担任拉丁美洲开发银行副行长一职
item.description: 加布里埃尔-约里奥（Gabriel Yorio）上个月从墨西哥财政部离职后，被任命为拉丁美洲主要开发银行的最高职位。【原文：Gabriel Yorio was named to a top post at Latin America’s main development bank following his departure from Mexico’s finance ministry last month.】

item.title: Instacart 聘请 Uber 外卖工程高管担任新首席技术官
item.description: Instacart 任命外卖竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. 的一名工程主管为新任首席技术官，该职位已空缺八个月。【原文：Instacart named an engineering leader from delivery competitor Uber Technologies Inc. as its new chief technology officer, a position that has been vacant for eight months.】

item.title: 西班牙火车制造商 Talgo 收到 Sidenor 集团的收购意向
item.description: 在政府否决了匈牙利 Ganz-Mavag Europe Zrt 公司的收购尝试后，Talgo SA 收到了钢铁公司 Sidenor Aceros Especiales SL 的来信，表示有意收购这家西班牙火车制造商。【原文：Talgo SA has received a letter from steel company Sidenor Aceros Especiales SL expressing interest in buying the Spanish trainmaker after the government vetoed an attempt by Hungary’s Ganz-Mavag Europe Zrt.】

item.title: 高盛、花旗等 22 家银行参与 CD&R 收购赛诺菲部门的交易
item.description: 包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc and Citigroup Inc. are among 22 banks set to provide Clayton Dubilier & Rice with buyout financing for a stake in Sanofi SA’s consumer health division.】
